Use_Waterfall_Cave_WaFF.Description: Make the Waterfall Cave accessible on your farm (by default, this will be in addition to the normal cave). Disabling this option will remove all of the cave extra entrances from the map.

Replace_Normal_Cave_WaFF.Description: WARNING! Empty your cave before activating that option as cave's content is not transferred automatically! Allow the Waterfall Cave to completely replace the farm's original cave instead of acting as an extra location (usefull for compatibility with older version of the mod). Note that this will conflict with any other mod modifying the regular cave.

Tent_Entrance_WaFF.Description: Replace the cave entrance between the farmhouse and the bus exit with a tent, similar to older versions of the mod.

Cellar_Allows_Casks_in_Cave_WaFF.Description: Once the farmhouse cellar is built, extend the usage of casks to the Waterfall Cave.

Smaller_Shortcut_Caves_WaFF.Description: Make the shortcuts' entrances smaller on the farm. Beware that regular horses will no longer be able to use them!

Secret_Woods_Shortcut_WaFF.Description: Unlock a path next to the farm's shrine that will quickly lead to the Secret Woods if the player has already been there at least once.

Use_Pethouse_WaFF.Description: Add a pethouse (or optionally some plants) right next to the farmhouse.

Pethouse_Type_WaFF.Description: Change the pethouse appearance to fit different styles. Beware that plants don't come with a water bowl for your pet.

Use_Animal_Pen_WaFF.Description: Place one or more animal pens on the western side of the farm.

Animal_Pen_Size_WaFF.Description: Select the amount and size of the animal pens.

Use_Invisible_Barriers_WaFF.Description: Prevent animals from using stairs, bridges or leaving the pen. Disable to let them roam the farm freely.

Add_Dark_Shrine_WaFF.Description: Generate a statue next to Grandpa's shrine that'll behave as a Dark Shrine. Useful to correct older versions of the farm where monsters spawning was incorrectly activated.

Beach_Type_WaFF.Description: Choose between a dry beach full of sand with very few water, a grassy beach with a large lake or a saltwater one with sea forage and palm trees.

Beach_Bridge_WaFF.Description: Turn the small bridges on the beach into either wooden planks or natural sand. Beware that the sand option will prevent you from laying path tiles over it, which may hinder mods relying on said tiles to work (like Automate).

Fish_Pool_WaFF.Description: Select the type of fishes that can be caught on the farm (this feature will change after Stardew Valley 1.6 update). Sea fishes can only be caught if the sea beach is active.

Turn_Pond_into_Spa_WaFF.Description: Turn the small pond south of the twin waterfalls into a healing pond.

No_Water_Spa_WaFF.Description: Remove water effects and properties from the healing pond (usefull for some mod compatibility issues, note that this is automatically actived when using the Swim mod).

Fountain_Decoration_WaFF.Description: Add a fountain and its decorated surroundings to the farm.

TF_Dirt_Color_WaFF.Description: Select the color of the dirt around the twin waterfalls area. The automatic option will leave the dirt dark and only change it in case of compatibility issues (like mods trying to use said dirt as quarry tiles).

Add_Cliffs_N_WaFF.Description: Add a cliff on the farmhouse main island.

Add_Cliffs_E_WaFF.Description: Add a cliff to the eastern part of the map.

Add_Small_Ridges_N_WaFF.Description: Add a small ridge south of the farmhouse.

Add_Small_Ridges_E_WaFF.Description: Add a small ridge near the south-eastern bridge.

Dense_Forest_Area_WaFF.Description: Add trees and a dense foliage above the tree stumps West of the farm.

Fences_WaFF.Description: Handle the amount of decorative fences that will be present on the farm.

Small_Stairs_Hills_WaFF.Description: Reverse the two hills' large stairs at the eastern side of the map into their original smaller size. Beware that regular horses will no longer be able to use them!

Old_Main_Bridge_WaFF.Description: Replace the bridge beween the farmhouse and the path to the bus stop by the bigger one used in previous versions of the mod.

Entries.ATK_WaFF_Description: Waterfall Forest_A medium size map, offering you the boons of a forest and circled by waterfalls!
